output_list.criticism: The transferFrom function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _from[msg.sender]. This can lead to incorrect token balances and potentially loss of funds.
The receiveApproval function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _extraData[msg.sender]. This can lead to incorrect token balances and potentially loss of funds.
The transfer function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _to[msg.sender]. This can lead to incorrect token balances and potentially loss of funds.
The approve function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _extraData[msg.sender]. This can lead to incorrect token balances and potentially loss of funds.
The allowance function has an integer overflow in the calculation of allowed[_owner][msg.sender]. This can lead to incorrect token balances and potentially loss of funds.
The balanceOf function has an integer overflow in the calculation of balances[_owner]. This can lead to incorrect token balances and potentially loss of funds.
The totalSupply function has an integer overflow in the calculation of totalSupply. This can lead to incorrect token balances and potentially loss of funds.
